Posts.Content: May 14, 2007 02:08PM amarie27 wrote: I'm not familiar with treatments associated with breast cancer, and I won't pretend to be. However, from what I know, alternative treatments have not been successful in dealing with cancer. If they were, they would have replaced chemo and radiation by now. I think you should persist with your mum and try to convince her to go for chemo/radiation. I know they are harsh treatments but they have been known to work.
Posts.Title: HELP! My Mom is refusing treatments chikibia77 Pretzel
